message_text:
This is personalized chatbot - chatbot with a pre-defined personality.
Please have a chat with it and evaluate its performance.
To begin a conversation: enter "/begin".
In the beginning of a conversation you will get a description of a person.
During a dialogue you need to act as if you were this person (e.g. if your profile says "I study arts in a university", you can say that you are an arts student).
To end a conversation: enter "/end".
When the dialogue is finished, you will be asked to evaluate it:
1) you will need to rate a conversation from 1 (bad) to 5 (excellent);
2) you will be given two descriptions of a person. Choose the one which belongs to your peer.
To complain about a chatbots bad behaviour (insults, profanities, etc.) enter "/complain".

1. To start a dialog type or choose  a "/begin" command.
2. You will be connected to a peer or, if no peer is available at the moment, you will receive the message "Please wait for you partner".
3. Peer might be a bot or another human evaluator.
4. After you were connected with your peer you will receive a starting message - a description of a person.
5. During a dialogue you need to act as if you were this person (e.g.if your profile says "I study arts in a university", you can say that you are an arts student).
6. Please score every utterance of your peer with a thumb up button if you like it, and thumb down button in the opposite case.
7. To finish the conversation type or choose a command /end.
8. If you were insulted type / complain or choose command / complain from menu.
9. When the conversation is finished, you will receive a request to score the overall quality of the dialog from 1 (bad) to 5 (excellent).
10. Also you will be given two descriptions of a person. Choose the one which belongs to your peer.
11. If your peer ends the dialog before you, you will also receive a scoring request.
12. Your conversations with a peer will be recorded for further use. By starting a chat you give permission for your anonymized conversation data to be released publicly under Apache License Version 2.0 https://www.apache.org / licenses / LICENSE â€“ 2.0.
Cannot start a new conversation. Please finish your current dialog first. Use /help command for usage instructions.
Searching for peer. Please wait...
Partner found!
This is your profile. During the dialog pretend to be this person:
Dialog is finished. Thank you for participation!
Your conversation secret id: {}
No peers found. Try again later.
You are banned from using the system.
INTERNAL_ERROR
Unexpected message. You are not in a dialog yet or the dialog has already been finished. Use /help command for usage instructions.
You're not in a dialog now.
Evaluation is not allowed at the moment. Use /help command for usage instructions.
Please evaluate the whole dialog using one of the buttons below:
Evaluation saved. Waiting for your partner to finish evaluation...

Evaluation saved. Your conversation secret id: {}

Waiting for your partner to finish evaluation...
Select a profile which, in your opinion, belongs to your partner:
Partner profile choosing is not allowed at the moment. Use /help command for usage instructions.
Which one of these sentences describes your partner better ({}/{})?
You are not in a dialog. Complaining is not available.
Your complaint has been recorded and will be examined by the system administrator. Note that your conversation is still active. You can always use /end command to end it.
Could not save your complaint. Have the dialog even started? You cannot complain when there is no messages in a dialog.
You are in a dialog. Bot setting is not available. Please finish it and retry bot setting.

Your default bot is: {}

Enter bot token to set default bot or:
/unsetbot command to unset default bot for your user in this channel
/listbots command to list all active bots and their tokens
/cancelsetbot command to cancel bot setting
Bot setting is not allowed.
Default bot for your user in this channel was unset.
You are not in bot setting mode now. Please run /setbot command.
Bot with token {} was set as default for your user in this channel.
No bot found with token: {}
Bot setting was canceled.
